entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM MST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 March 2023
